summary: In an idyllic setting, a likable but dangerously volatile twelve-year-old boy tries to settle a score with his disagreeable, mysterious neighbor.
cast: George Murphy|Nancy Reagan|Billy Gray|Lewis Stone|Kurt Kasznar|Anna Glomb|Stanley Andrews|Margaret Bert|Ed Cassidy|Warren Farlow|Wayne A. Farlow|Virginia Farmer|Kathleen Freeman|Jon Gardner|Donald Gordon|Harry Hines|Teddy Infuhr|Charles La Torre|Harry Lauter|Mitchell Lewis|Ralph Moody|Alvy Moore|Burt Mustin|Leslie K. O'Pace|Tudor Owen|Dan Riss|Cosmo Sardo|Gary Stewart|William Tannen|Maude Wallace|Katherine Warren|Jack Williams
title: Talk About a Stranger
